response:
The source of both of these algorithms are completely readable. Even non-coders will be able to read through and see how everything functions.

The reference documents will automatically update via the edit history as soon as a contributer makes a commit to the project.

These machine generated documents serve as the single source of truth for the duration of their lives. The bulk data is automatically extracted into DMs Guild for profit.

This project does not pretend to have all of the answers. It is here to frame questions. It's here to force DM's to confront questions they had never considered. I expect this project to take some twists and turns. Initially the bulk of content will revolve around designing, researching, and reverse
